alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Luzerne; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 12 at 2:24AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Susquehanna, Luzerne, southeastern Bradford and Wyoming Counties through 315 AM EST... At 224 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Laceyville to near Rohrsburg. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilkes-Barre, Falls, Muhlenberg, Kingston, Nanticoke, Plains, Pittston, Plymouth, Exeter and Vernon. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 80 between 256 and 262. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 151A and B and 170A and B, and near 206. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
